experiment_name: Unlocking the function promiscuity of old yellow enzyme to catalyze asymmetric Morita-Baylis-Hillman reaction
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:25 °C;    reaction_ph:10.0;    reaction_other_conditions:100 µM purified protein, 3% methanol (MeOH) as co-solvent, 220 rpm, 40 h;    reaction_substrate_concentration:5 mM 2-cyclopenten-1-one, 1 mM 4-nitrobenzaldehyde
